code: import{xdai,dai,eth}from'@burner-wallet/assets';import BurnerCore from'@burner-wallet/core';import{LocalSigner}from'@burner-wallet/core/signers';import{InfuraGateway,XDaiGateway}from'@burner-wallet/core/gateways';import{BurnerConnectBridge}from'@burner-wallet/burner-connect-wallet';var core=new BurnerCore({signers:[new LocalSigner()],gateways:[new InfuraGateway(process.env.REACT_APP_INFURA_KEY),new XDaiGateway()],assets:[xdai,dai,eth]});export default new BurnerConnectBridge(core);
